text:
Struggles and Triumphs

Dostoevsky, burdened by loss and debt.  
His heart aches with every word.  
Dostoevsky: "I must write faster!"  
Thought: "Can I bear this weight?"  

---

Mourners gather for his funeral.  
A sea of faces, grief palpable.  
Mourners: "He deserves a king's farewell!"  
Thought: "He was one of us."

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Dostoevsky faced immense personal and financial struggles throughout his life, yet he remained a deeply influential and beloved figure in Russian literature.
